CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Improvements for document library version history limits
CurrentVersion.description: ,We are introducing new version controls that help tenant and site admins or document library owners reduce the storage footprint driven by low value file versions. Today, document library owners can set count-based version limits at the individual document library level. With the upcoming changes, tenant and site admins or document library owners will have two version history settings: 1) Automatic mode that intelligently expires new and existing version based on their age and restore probability, and 2) Manual mode that will allow admins to set time-based version expiration and count limits on new and existing versions. These controls enable admins to set an appropriate level of recoverability and auditability for their organization balanced with storage usage considerations. Version history limits and management also apply to OneDrive for Business.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Improvements for document library version history limits
OldVersion.description: ,We are introducing new version controls that help tenant and site admins or document library owners reduce the storage footprint driven by low value file versions. Today, document library owners can set count-based version limits at the individual document library level. With the upcoming changes, tenant and site admins or document library owners will have two version history settings: 1) Automatic mode that intelligently expires new and existing version based on their age and restore probability, and 2) Manual mode that will allow admins to set time-based version expiration and count limits on new and existing versions. These controls enable admins to set an appropriate level of recoverability and auditability for their organization balanced with storage usage considerations. Version history limits and management also apply to OneDrive for Business.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook : Upload and share documents through OneDrive on large emails
CurrentVersion.description: When you try to attach a file to an email message that has hit the maximum size limit, or when an attachment will push the email over that limit, you will be prompted to upload the file to the OneDrive account associated with the email so that you can still easily share the document.

OldVersion.title: Outlook : Upload and share documents through OneDrive on large emails
OldVersion.description:
When you try to attach a file to an email
message that has hit the maximum size limit, or when an attachment will push
the email over that limit, you will be prompted to upload the file to the
OneDrive account associated with the email so that you can still easily
share the document.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Pick a local folder for saving attachments
CurrentVersion.description: Users are now able to pick a folder when saving an attachment in the new Outlook for Windows. This feature was rolled back to address some critical user feedback; we apologize for any inconvenience.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Pick a local folder for saving attachments
OldVersion.description: Users are now able to pick a folder when saving an attachment in the new Outlook for Windows.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting Options Categorization
CurrentVersion.description: We are introducing grouping within Meeting Options to improve organizers’ and co-organizers’ ease of understanding selections.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting Options Categorization
OldVersion.description:
We
are introducing grouping within Meeting Options to improve organizers’ and
co-organizers’ ease of understanding selections.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: In-app Teams devices store experience
CurrentVersion.description: With the Teams device store experience inside the Teams app, customers can easily discover and purchase certified Teams devices for personal or shared use cases – headsets, web cameras, desk phones, Teams Rooms, and more. Explore devices in categories, use search or filters to find desired device, and purchase all through the familiar Microsoft Teams interface. We are introducing a new experience for small businesses to purchase devices directly within Teams, businesses in the US and Canada will now be able to complete their purchase without leaving the app.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: In-app Teams devices store experience
OldVersion.description: With the Teams device store experience inside the Teams app, customers can easily discover and purchase certified Teams devices for personal or shared use cases – headsets, web cameras, desk phones, Teams Rooms, and more. Explore devices in categories, use search or filters to find desired device, and purchase all through the familiar Microsoft Teams interface. We are introducing a new experience for small businesses to purchase devices directly within Teams, businesses in the US and Canada will now be able to complete their purchase without leaving the app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Keyword highlight support for document trainable classifiers
CurrentVersion.description: Highlight the keywords/phrases that are contributing significantly to the Trainable classifier results, so that users can easily understand the classification of the documents. This would build trust of the users of the OOB classifications and empower them to create DLP policies.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Keyword highlight support for document trainable classifiers
OldVersion.description: Highlight the keywords/phrases that are contributing significantly to the Trainable classifier results, so that users can easily understand the classification of the documents. This would build trust of the users of the OOB classifications and empower them to create DLP policies.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Add a hyperlink or text callout to a video at specific times
CurrentVersion.description: Make your video interactive and more engaging by adding annotations that can include hyperlinks and text. Call out important moments or share documents and other links to additional resources. You can add text and links anywhere in the video timeline to help guide your viewers to the right information. Note: The release state now reflects the current status. We apologize for any inconveniences.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Add a hyperlink or text callout to a video at specific times
OldVersion.description: Make your video interactive and more engaging by adding annotations that can include hyperlinks and text. Call out important moments or share documents and other links to additional resources. You can add text and links anywhere in the video timeline to help guide your viewers to the right information.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Azure protected voicemail on Teams App
CurrentVersion.description: Teams users will now have link to their Azure protected voicemails from the Teams App. Users will get notification for the voicemail on the Teams App and can open the attached link to access the voicemail on the web browser.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Azure protected voicemail on Teams App
OldVersion.description: Teams users will now have link to their Azure protected voicemails from the Teams App. Users will get notification for the voicemail on the Teams App and can open the attached link to access the voicemail on the web browser.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Tenant-wide policy for permission to download meeting transcripts and user-level controls for who can view and edit meeting transcripts
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing a new control for IT administrators to restrict permissions for the download of meeting transcript files (stored in OneDrive for Business) for any users within the tenant. This policy applies to new meeting transcripts across the entire organization. Administrators can exempt people who are members of specified security groups from the policy. This allows admins to specify governance or compliance specialists who should have download access to meeting transcripts. We are also updating the default permissions so that even when the policy is not applied only transcript owners (recording initiator or meeting organizer) will have permission to download or delete the transcript file, while meeting participants can only view the transcript in Teams app or Stream. In addition to the tenant-wide policy for download permission, the meeting organizer will be able to select in Stream which participants are restricted from downloading, viewing, and editing the transcript in Stream.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Inactive teams and inactive domains report export capability
CurrentVersion.description: Admins will be able to export the inactive teams and inactive domains reports to a csv file in Teams Admin Center.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Inactive teams and inactive domains report export capability
OldVersion.description: Admins will be able to export the inactive teams and inactive domains reports to a csv file in Teams Admin Center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Oversharing Popups enhancements on Outlook win32 desktop
CurrentVersion.description: ,We are expanding the functionality of oversharing popups (Show policy tip as a dialog) in outlook win32 to support the following: 1) Additional scenarios powered with predicates such as Content is not labeled, Message/Attachment is not labeled, and File extension is, and 2) Customizable oversharing dialog with the ability to configure custom title, body, business justifications, and dynamic variables/tokens for matched recipients, attachment names, and labels.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Oversharing Popups enhancements on Outlook win32 desktop
OldVersion.description: ,We are expanding the functionality of oversharing popups (Show policy tip as a dialog) in outlook win32 to support the following: 1) Additional scenarios powered with predicates such as Content is not labeled, Message/Attachment is not labeled, and File extension is, and 2) Customizable oversharing dialog with the ability to configure custom title, body, business justifications, and dynamic variables/tokens for matched recipients, attachment names, and labels.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Shared call history for delegates and delegators
CurrentVersion.description: We're continuing to provide a more tailored call delegation experience. Call delegators and delegates will now be able to see shared call history records for the shared line.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Shared call history for delegates and delegators
OldVersion.description: We're continuing to provide a more tailored call delegation experience. Call delegators and delegates will now be able to see shared call history records for the shared line.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Pay-as-you-go transcript translations
CurrentVersion.description:
Make your content more inclusive by creating videos that your coworkers can easily view and understand in their primary language. Transcript translations in Stream (on SharePoint) give you the option to translate the transcript and closed captions of your Stream videos into more than 100 supported languages. To enable translations Admins must first setup billing using an Azure subscription, then they must be enable the feature in the M365 Admin center. Once enabled translations are billed via pay-as-you-go meters.
More info: https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/microsoft-syntex-pay-as-you-go-transcript-translations-in-stream-for-sharepoint-2e34ad1b-e213-47ed-a806-5cc0d88751de

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Pay-as-you-go transcript translations
OldVersion.description:
Make your content more inclusive by creating videos that your coworkers can easily view and understand in their primary language. Transcript translations in Stream (on SharePoint) give you the option to translate the transcript and closed captions of your Stream videos into more than 100 supported languages. To enable translations Admins must first setup billing using an Azure subscription, then they must be enable the feature in the M365 Admin center. Once enabled translations are billed via pay-as-you-go meters.
More info: https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/microsoft-syntex-pay-as-you-go-transcript-translations-in-stream-for-sharepoint-2e34ad1b-e213-47ed-a806-5cc0d88751de

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Chat for organizers and presenters in town hall
CurrentVersion.description: Organizers, co-organizers, and presenters can chat privately in a separate chat from attendees. This chat is available to access before, during, and after the event.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Chat for organizers and presenters in town hall
OldVersion.description: Organizers, co-organizers, and presenters can chat privately in a separate chat from attendees. This chat is available to access before, during, and after the event.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection in Gov Cloud
CurrentVersion.description: Adaptive Protection will now be available in Government clouds. Adaptive Protection is a capability of Microsoft Purview that dynamically assigns appropriate Data Loss Prevention policies to users based on the risk levels analyzed by the machine learning models in Insider Risk Management. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection in Gov Cloud
OldVersion.description: Adaptive Protection will now be available in Government clouds. Adaptive Protection is a capability of Microsoft Purview that dynamically assigns appropriate Data Loss Prevention policies to users based on the risk levels analyzed by the machine learning models in Insider Risk Management. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Updated teams and channels onboarding flow
CurrentVersion.description: When added to a new team, users can see which channels the team owner recommended, and select to show only the channels that are relevant to them.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: New landing experience for Viva Connections desktop
CurrentVersion.description: Help people in your organization manage their daily flow of work using a customized landing experience in Teams that displays the most important tasks, tools, news, and resources in one central place. The new landing experience offers expanded navigational tools between Viva apps and acts as the home base for Viva experiences in Teams.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: New landing experience for Viva Connections desktop
OldVersion.description: Help people in your organization manage their daily flow of work using a customized landing experience in Teams that displays the most important tasks, tools, news, and resources in one central place. The new landing experience offers expanded navigational tools between Viva apps and acts as the home base for Viva experiences in Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection - Enhancements to insider risk level settings
CurrentVersion.description: ,With this new feature, an admin can choose whether they want to expire the Adaptive Protection insider risk level. Today, this expiration happens automatically, but you can now choose to keep the Adaptive Protection insider risk level for a user, even if their alert is dismissed or case is closed. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Improvements to “Deleting of SharePoint files/folders” indicators
CurrentVersion.description: Today “Deleting of SharePoint files” and “Deleting of SharePoint folders” indicators include permanent file or folder deletion event operations FileDeleted, FolderDeleted respectively. With this update, these indicators also capture files/folders moved to recycle bin which includes FileRecycled, FolderRecycled, so you will see more activities being captured by these indicators. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Granular exclusion
CurrentVersion.description: Granular exclusion allows admins to adjust and fine tune indicators according to organizational preferences to help tailor the detection of risks that may lead to a potential security incident. For example, admins can configure the indicator “sending email with attachments to recipients outside the organization” to only detect emails sent to personal domains (e.g. outlook.com). In that way, admins can reduce the number of false positives. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Tenant Allow Block list in GCC, GCCH, and DoD
CurrentVersion.description: All the Tenant Allow/Block functionality as present in WW environment will be available to admins and security analyst of GCC, GCCH, and DoD.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Tenant Allow Block list in GCC, GCCH, and DoD
OldVersion.description: All the Tenant Allow/Block functionality as present in WW environment will be available to admins and security analyst of GCC, GCCH, and DoD.

CurrentVersion.title: Bookings: SMS Notifications for Staff scheduled appointments in Bookings (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: If you have a Microsoft Teams Premium license you can now set up SMS text notifications in Microsoft Bookings to be sent to the person booking an appointment. Currently, SMS notifications will be sent only when appointments are scheduled by an attendee via a published booking page. With this update, the capability is extended to include sending SMS confirmations and reminders to the attendee when appointments are booked through the calendar scheduling experience in Bookings by a scheduler or a staff member.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Apps now supported in group chats with external users
CurrentVersion.description: Users can now access applications in group chats with individuals outside their organization, fostering improved collaboration, interactivity, and productivity. The group chat’s host involving external participants can install, remove, or update applications for use by all members.

With the upcoming changes, tenant and site admins or document library owners will have two version history settings: 1) Automatic mode that intelligently expires new and existing version based on their age and restore probability, and 2) Manual mode that will allow admins to set time-based version expiration and count limits on new and existing versions. These controls enable admins to set an appropriate level of recoverability and auditability for their organization balanced with storage usage considerations. Version history limits and management also apply to OneDrive for Business.
